prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon that resembles a sleek, blue wolf with lightning bolt accents.
Show me a Pokemon inspired by a storm, featuring bright yellow fur and sharp, angular designs.
Imagine a powerful electric creature with a dynamic pose, accentuated by its vibrant colors and striking features.
Design a Pokemon that embodies speed and agility, with a design that includes electric currents and stunning colors.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that has a fierce look, combining blue and yellow in a unique way.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a guardian of the skies, with a body that showcases both power and elegance.
Give me a Pokemon that can be found in urban areas, with a design that reflects its electric nature.

distinctive_features: Lightning bolt patterns on the body
